user.title: Setup Trinnov Altitude
user.description: Your device needs to be on in order to add the integation.

data_description.host: The hostname or IP address of your Trinnov Altitude device. Be sure to configure your IP address to be static.
data_description.mac: The MAC address of your Trinnov Altitude device. Used for Wake-On-Lan (WAL).

reconfigure.title: Reconfigure Trinnov Altitude
reconfigure.description: Your device needs to be on in order to reconfigure the integation.

data_description.host: The hostname or IP address of your Trinnov Altitude device. Be sure to configure your IP address to be static.
data_description.mac: The MAC address of your Trinnov Altitude device. Used for Wake-On-Lan (WAL).
